resources.string: Please chose a department number: (please add a 0 before for departments 1-9)

Welcome to Dept_search. This app allows to do a research about a department by giving you a list of its towns. Yoyu will also be able to acces to the Wikipedia page of th edepartment, or open a navigation app with a spontaneously calculated itinerary.
ERROR : No towns found, please fill in a valid department number
